name: Invasion
overview: Invasion is a vehicle themed Science fiction third and first-person shooter where you take on the role of a resistance fighter. Earths defense forces are quickly defeated by an invading alien army called the Keseits. With the army and most resources gone it’s now up to the player to help the resistance against the alien invaders. In the game the player will pilot his ship and takes on missions to destroy enemies structures and ships. Destroyed enemies yield points for a level score.
